``` {python}

def clean_text(text):
    text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', text)  # remove extra spaces
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s]', '', text)  # remove punctuation
    return text.strip()
```

``` {python}
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

df['cleaned_recitals'] = df['recitals'].apply(clean_text)
```
